craf.name: AdaptiveHelm
craf.add_attrs:
Gain an additional 15% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tanks and Fighters: Gain 35 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Other Roles: Gain 15% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10% additional Attack Damage and Ability Power from all sources.

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 7% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craf.name: Crownguard
craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.

When the Shield expires, gain 25% Ability Power.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

craf.name: Evenshroud
craf.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craf.name: Fimbulwinter
craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain 20 Mana.

At 40% Health, gain 15 Mana and a Shield equal to 20% max Health.

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Gain 15% additional Damage Amp against Tanks.

craf.name: Guardbreaker
craf.add_attrs: Critical Strikes grant 5% Damage Amp for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects.

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Gain 6% stacking Attack Speed every second.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
- 15% Attack Damage and 15% Ability Power.
- 12% Omnivamp.

While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 20% of damage dealt.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 150% of the Mana spent.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: Perfect peace and calm for the holder - and all who face it.

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 20% Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: NashorsTooth
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 2 bonus Mana, increased to 4 if they critically strike.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds.

Gain 3% stacking Attack Speed every second.

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.

craf.name: RedBuffItem
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: Regenerate 2.5% of missing Health each second.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 3% stacking Attack Damage, up to 20 attacks. After 20 attacks, gain 40% Attack Speed.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

craf.name: SteadfastHeart
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10% Durability. While above 50% Health, instead gain 18% Durability.

craf.name: SteraksGage
craf.add_attrs: At 60% Health, gain a Shield equal to 50% of the wearer's maximum Health that rapidly decays over 5 seconds.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 8% max Health.

Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target�s max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2% Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 10% Damage Amp and gain immunity to crowd control.

craf.name: VoidStaff
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Ability damage 30% Shred the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Gain 12% max health.

embl.name: BastionEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Bastion trait.
Gain 15% of Armor as Attack Damage.
Gain 15% of Magic Resistance as Ability Power.

embl.name: ExecutionerEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Executioner trait.
Attacks and Abilities that critically strike deal 20% bonus true damage over 3 seconds.

embl.name: StrategistEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Strategist trait.

Combat Start: The holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row gain bonuses.
Front 2 rows: 20 Armor and Magic Resist
Back 2 rows: 15% Attack Speed

embl.name: StarGuardianEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Star Guardian trait.

Teamwork: Non-emblem Star Guardian bonuses are increased by 10%. This effect stacks.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

embl.name: SupremeCellsEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Supreme Cells trait.

embl.name: SoulFighterEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Soul Fighter trait.

embl.name: LuchadorEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Luchador trait.

embl.name: CrystalGambitEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Crystal Gambit trait.

embl.name: WraithEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Wraith trait.

embl.name: SorcererEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Sorcerer trait.
The holder gains 18% more Ability Power from all sources.

embl.name: DuelistEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Duelist trait.

Attacks deal 12 bonus true damage, plus 6 bonus true damage for each time the target was damaged by this effect.

embl.name: EdgelordEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Edgelord trait.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy reduces their Armor by 2.

embl.name: ProdigyEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Prodigy trait.
On cast, shield the lowest percent Health ally for 250% of mana spent.

embl.name: HeavyweightEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Heavyweight trait, and gains 150 max Health on takedown.

embl.name: JuggernautEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Juggernaut trait.
While above 50% Health, gain 30% Attack Speed.

embl.name: BattleAcademiaEmblem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Battle Academia trait, and 120 Health and 6% Damage Amp per %i:set14AmpIcon%.

embl.name: SniperEmblemItem
embl.add_attrs: The holder gains the Sniper trait and 2 range.

embl.name: ProtectorEmblemItem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Protector trait.
When a shield on the holder breaks, heal the holder and the nearest ally for 20% of the shield's initial value.

radi.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain a 50% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.

When the Shield expires, gain 50% Ability Power.

Marksman/Caster: Gain 60% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

radi.name: NashorsToothRadiant
radi.add_attrs: Attacks grant 4 bonus Mana, increased to 8 if they critically strike.

radi.name: RadientArchangelsStaff

radi.name: RadientBloodthirster

Gain 15% max health.

Take 25% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 175 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

radi.name: RadientDeathblade
radi.add_attrs: It glows in the presence of enemies. Or friends. Or anything alive, really.

radi.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radi.add_attrs:
Gain 15% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 10% max Health.

radi.name: RadientEdgeofNight
radi.add_attrs: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable, shed negative effects, and heal all missing health.

radi.name: RadientGargoyleStoneplate
radi.add_attrs:
Heal 1.5% max Health each second.

Gain 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

30% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 200% of the Mana spent..

Also, heal 1.5% max Health per second.

radi.add_attrs:

radi.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

radi.add_attrs:

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radi.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 45 seconds.

Gain 6% stacking Attack Speed every second.

radi.add_attrs: It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.

radi.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 2% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radi.add_attrs: Attacks grant 6% stacking Attack Damage, up to 20 attacks. After 20 attacks, gain 80% Attack Speed.

radi.add_attrs: Critical Strikes grant 8% Damage Amp for 8 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

Gain 12% max Health.

Every 1.5 seconds, deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 3 hexes for 8 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: reduces healing received

radi.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

radi.name: RadientTitansResolve
radi.add_attrs:
Gain 3% Attack Damage and 3% Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20% Damage Amp and gain immunity to crowd control.

radi.name: RadientWarmogsArmor
radi.add_attrs:
Gain 20% max health.

Heal 1.5% max Health per second.

radi.name: SteraksMegashield
radi.add_attrs: At 60% Health, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the wearer's maximum Health that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

arti.name: Dawncore
arti.add_attrs: Reduce the holder's max Mana by 10. Subsequent spellcasts reduce max Mana by 10%, to a minimum of 15.

arti.name: BlightingJewel
arti.add_attrs: Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 4. If their Magic Resist is 0, grant the holder 3 Mana instead.

arti.name: DeathfireGrasp
arti.add_attrs: Combat start: Blast the current target for 40% of their max Health as magic damage. Repeat this every 13 seconds.

arti.name: Fishbones
arti.add_attrs: The holder's attacks target random enemies.

arti.name: Flickerblade
arti.add_attrs: Attacks grant 6% stacking Attack Speed. Every 5 attacks also grant 3% Attack Damage and 4% Ability Power.

arti.name: GamblersBlade
arti.add_attrs:
Grant %i:scaleAS% 1% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% 30 gold).

Each attack has a 5% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Gold generated this game: 0

arti.name: HorizonFocus
arti.add_attrs: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage.

arti.name: Hullcrusher
arti.add_attrs: Combat Start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health, 20% Attack Damage, and 20% Ability Power.

arti.name: IndomitableGauntlet
arti.add_attrs:
The holder's Move Speed is drastically reduced.

Gain 10% max Health, stun immunity, and pull the current target into melee range.

arti.name: InnervatingLocket
arti.add_attrs:
The holder gains 1% of their total Mana whenever they're hit by an attack.

Each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

arti.name: LichBane
arti.add_attrs:
The holder's first attack after each Ability cast deals 0 bonus magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage.

arti.name: LightshieldCrest
arti.add_attrs:
Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 70% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds.

On death grants this shield to all allies.

arti.name: Mittens
arti.add_attrs:
Shrinks the holder, granting them increased movement speed and immunity to Chill.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed

arti.name: MogulsMail
arti.add_attrs:
Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 10 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 35 times.

At full stacks, grant %i:goldCoins% 1 gold and continue gaining %i:goldCoins% 1 gold every 10 seconds.

Gold generated this game: 0
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
After casting the first time in combat, gain 100 Mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their maximum Health. Executions have a 33% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs: Tons of EVERYTHING!

arti.name: OrnnItemZhonyasHourglass
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat at 40% Health, become invulnerable and untargetable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: ProwlersClaw
arti.add_attrs: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within 4 hexes. The next 2 critical attacks deal 60% bonus Critical Strike Damage.

arti.name: RapidFirecannon
arti.add_attrs: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.

arti.name: SeekersArmguard
arti.add_attrs: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by 15, increased to 20 if they score the kill.

arti.name: SilvermereDawn
arti.add_attrs:
Grants immunity to Stuns and the holder's attacks Stun the target for 0.8 seconds.

The holder's Attack Speed is locked at 0.5.

arti.name: SnipersFocus
arti.add_attrs: Gain %i:scaleRange% 2 Attack Range. Gain 9% Damage Amp against a target for each hex between the holder and the target.

arti.name: SpectralCutlass
arti.add_attrs: Combat start: Teleport the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After 8 seconds, the holder returns to their original location.

arti.name: StatikkShiv
arti.add_attrs: Every 3rd attack deals 40 + 40% of the holder's Ability Power as additional magic damage to 4 enemies.

arti.name: SuspiciousTrenchCoat
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat at 60% Health, the holder splits into 3 copies of themself each with 33% of their max Health.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: TalismanOfAscension
arti.add_attrs: After 22 seconds gain 100% max Health and 120% Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

arti.name: TitanicHydra
arti.add_attrs: Attacks deal 3% of the holder's max Health plus 8% of their Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

arti.name: TrickstersGlass
arti.add_attrs:
Summon a clone with 70% base Health and +10% max Mana. You cannot equip items to the clone.

The clone benefits from active traits

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: UnendingDespair
arti.add_attrs: Whenever a Shield on the holder breaks, 150% of that Shield's initial value is dealt to the nearest enemy as magic damage.

arti.name: WitsEnd
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks deal 0 bonus magic damage.

Heals the holder for 35% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage.
